resources.string: You\'re in control! Decide your daily earnings, availability and sharing preferences
Let renters know what they\'re getting
A well maintained car guarantees eyeballs. Prepare minimum 3 external/internal photos to upload
Just 3 steps to host your car!
The actual location is needed for our renters to find your car. Don\'t worry your actual location won\'t be shown to public
Insurance type can be found on the front page\nof your policy
Your car can be located and tracked with our \nhighly accurate TARA tracker. A refundable deposit\nof Php 5,000 is applicable
Tell our renters more about your car and what\nmakes it special!

TARA is a people-to-people carHosted sharing platform where Guests can rent any carHosted from the TARA community that meets the needs and expectations for their planned and upcoming travels.\n\nTARA envisions a world where people are more connected, mobility is improved, and travel is simplified. We strive to assist our guests, particularly someone without a carHosted, in filling the gaps in their travel by exploring with any carHosted. We also want to provide Hosts the opportunity to increase their income in financing their vehicles and their lives while also helping in the improvement of mobility in the Philippines.

Find the ideal car for your needs.

From dream cars to daily driving, we have a huge selection of 4-wheelers to any occasion. Whether its weddings, joyrides around town, road trips, adventures to new places, you can rent your desired carHosted at an affordable rate from TARA.

Be sustainable and eco-friendly.

Sharing a car eliminates around 11 vehicles from the road, resulting in lower carbon emissions, less pollution, and better air quality. By sharing a car, we are doing ourselves and the planet a favor.

Enhance your quality of life.

TARA's goal is to create improved mobility features with the best carHosted sharing experience ever. Share your carHosted as a Host to earn extra income and rent out other host vehicles for any drive.

Strengthen Community Experience

Meet people who share your interests in the TARA carHosted sharing community. TARA aspires to create a community that shares the goal of increasing mobility, reducing carbon emissions, and creating a better environment for humanity.
